string.text: Base has been reinforced.
You already have plenty of backup, what do you need us for?
Ok, we'll be right there, hang on!
There are no nerby squads that could help you out, sorry...
Ok, we arrived at
Moving to your position.
* You need to be in a faction to use this command. *
We can't spare any more men.
Sorry, but you're on your own.
Our men can't get to you! The road is not safe.
* Your squad cannot reach your position. Check if there is a safe entrance between you and your faction territory *
There are already
squads in your location.
We're not sending any more men to the
squads on their way to
Just hold on an wait a bit for them.
are already there! We can't send any more to that location.
You're in our base! Why would you need support there?!
Roger! We're on our way
Roger! Our guys are on their way to
A squad is on its way to help you! Hold on!
Sorry friend, but it's to dangerous to send out men after dark. You're on your own.
This is base! We're sending a squad to help you out!
We can't send any more men to your location. You have to make it through with who you got. Good luck!
